kpi.name: M1000C149

kpi_info.title: HS-DSCH RELEASE DUE TO DL OVERLOAD
kpi_info.use: The number of HS-DSCH allocation releases due to downlink overload. This counter includes both interactive and background class connections. UPDATED: When the user's HS-DSCH allocation is released due to condition PtxNonHSDPA>=PtxTargetHSDPA+PtxOffsetHSDPA.Thiscounter is updated only when HSDPA Static Resource Allocation is used.

kpi.kpi_alias: HS-DSCH RELEASE DUE TO DL OVERLOAD
